events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing the resume and cover letter shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering after verifying the relevant skills and experience listed, including software development expertise.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process and coordinate further steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles and past project experience.
Following the screening, the candidate promptly responded expressing enthusiasm for the next stage and confirming availability for a technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess in-depth coding skills and problem-solving abilities in software development.
